snippet.title: E.T. Armies Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
E.T. Armies is available on Steam
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/382420/

E.T. Armies is an action-packed, fast-paced, science-fiction first person shooter. The game takes place in a future where Earth has been reduced to ashes; It is now home to a new nation that hungers only for war. Prepare yourself to rise and defend against the invasion of the Forsaken.

Game Website: http://etarmies.com
Merge Games : http://mergegames.com
Raspina Studio : http://raspinastudio.com 
IndieDB : http://indiedb.com/games/extraterrestrial-armies-et-armies
Facebook: https://facebook.com/ETArmies
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RaspinaStudio
